subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=c|rs=凵03}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|おう}}

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|おう|hhira=あふ}}

# [[concave]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The character {{lang|ja|凹}} with the reading ''ō'' is only used in compounds, and never in isolation.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds using {{lang|ja|凹}} (''ō'')}}
* {{ja-r|凹%角|おう%かく}}: a [[reflex]] [[angle]]
* {{ja-r|凹%型|おう%がた}}: a [[die]] or other [[three-dimensional]] [[shape]] having a [[concave]] [[cross-section]]
* {{ja-r|凹%形|おう%けい}}: a [[concave]] [[shape]]
* {{ja-r|凹%状|おう%じょう}}: [[concavity]]
* {{ja-r|凹 多%角%形|おう た%かく%けい}}: a [[polygon]] with at least one [[internal]] [[reflex]] [[angle]]
* {{ja-r|凹%地|おう%ち}}: an area where the [[ground]] is noticeable [[lower]] than the surrounding area
* {{ja-r|凹%凸|おう%とつ}}: [[bumpiness]], [[unevenness]]; [[inequality]], [[variation]], [[ups and downs]]
* {{ja-r|凹%凸 画|おう%とつ が}}: a style of [[w:Sui Dynasty|Sui-Dynasty]] [[wall]] [[painting]] using [[trompe l'œil]] techniques to look three-dimensional
* {{ja-r|凹%凸 レンズ|おう%とつ レンズ}}: a [[concavo-convex]] [[lens]]
* {{ja-r|凹%版|おう%はん}}: an [[intaglio]]
* {{ja-r|凹%版 印%刷|おう%はん いん%さつ}}: [[intaglio]] [[printing]]
* {{ja-r|凹%面|おう%めん}}: a [[concave]] [[surface]]
* {{ja-r|凹%面%鏡|おう%めん%きょう}}: a [[concave]] [[mirror]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|準%凹|じゅん%おう}}: [[quasiconcavity]]
* {{ja-r|凸%凹|とつ%おう|totsuō}}: [[bumpiness]], [[unevenness]]; [[inequality]], [[variation]], [[ups and downs]]
* {{ja-r|凸%凹 瘢%痕|とつ%おう はん%こん}}: an [[uneven]] [[scar]]
* {{ja-r|凸%凹 レンズ|とつ%おう レンズ}}: a [[convexo-concave]] [[lens]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くぼ}}
{{unk|ja|sort=くぼ}}. Sound similarities might suggest a connection to words related to {{m|en|darkness}} or ''deep'' {{m|en|interior}}, such as {{m|ja|雲|tr=kumo||cloud}}, {{m|ja|蜘蛛|tr=kumo||spider}}, {{m|ja|隈|tr=kuma||a recess, a deep interior corner}}, {{m|ja|黒|tr=kuro||black}}, {{m|ja|暗|tr=kura||darkness}}; more at {{m|ja|黒}}. Alternately, these broad similarities might be pure coincidence.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|くぼ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK|acc2=1|acc2_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|窪|くぼ|rom=-}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Terms derived from {{lang|ja|凹}} (''kubo'')}}
* {{ja-r|窪い|くぼい|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹い|くぼい}}: [[hollowed]] [[out]], [[indented]]; of [[low]] [[status]], [[mean]]
* {{ja-r|窪か|くぼか|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹か|くぼか}}: [[hollowed]] [[out]], [[indented]], [[depressed]] (physically), [[low]]
* {{ja-r|窪む|くぼむ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹む|くぼむ}}: to become [[hollowed]] [[out]] or [[indented]]; to [[hollow]] [[out]] or [[indent]] something; to [[sink]] [[inwardly]], to [[collapse]] inwardly; to [[fall]] upon [[hard time]]s, to become [[poor]]
* {{ja-r|窪み|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|窪|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹み|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹|くぼみ}}: ''see below''
* {{ja-r|窪まる|くぼまる|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹まる|くぼまる}}: to become [[hollowed]] [[out]] or [[indented]]; to [[squat]] for a while, to [[sink]] into a [[crouch]]
* {{ja-r|窪める|くぼめる|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹める|くぼめる}}: to [[make]] something [[sink]] or [[collapse]] [[inwardly]]; to [[dent]] something; to make something into a [[hollowed]] [[out]] shape
* {{ja-r|窪やか|くぼやか|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹やか|くぼやか}}: [[hollowed]] [[out]], [[indented]], [[depressed]] (physically), [[low]]
* {{ja-r|窪%窪|くぼ%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%凹|くぼ%くぼ}}: in a [[hollowed]] [[out]] or [[indented]] way
* {{ja-r|窪%地|くぼ%ち|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%地|くぼ%ち}}: a [[hollow]], a [[dip]], a [[depression]] or [[low]] spot in the [[ground]]
* {{ja-r|窪%田|くぼ%た|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%田|くぼ%た}}: a [[paddy]] or [[wet]] [[field]] in a [[low]] [[place]]
* {{ja-r|窪%目|くぼ%め|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|窪%眼|くぼ%め|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%目|くぼ%め|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%眼|くぼ%め}}: [[deep-set]] [[eye]]s, [[sunken]] eyes
* {{ja-r|窪%溜|くぼ%たまり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹%溜|くぼ%たまり}}: a [[low]] [[place]] where water tends to gather
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|笑%窪|え%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|靨|えくぼ}}: a [[dimple]], particularly one from [[smiling]]
* {{ja-r|大%窪|^おお%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|大%久保|^おお%くぼ}}: a [[surname]]
* {{ja-r|落%窪|おち%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|落ち窪|おちくぼ}}: a [[dip]] in the [[floor]] or [[ground]]
* {{ja-r|手%窪|て%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|手%凹|て%くぼ}}; {{ja-r|手の窪|て の くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|手の凹|て の くぼ}}: a [[cupped]] [[hand]]; a [[rice]] [[ball]]; [[eat]]ing [[rice]] by [[hand]]; a [[one-night stand]], a [[fling]] or [[short-term]] [[romance]]
* {{ja-r|中%窪|なか%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹|なかくぼ}}: ''see below''
* {{ja-r|盆の窪|ぼん の くぼ}}: the [[hollow]] of the [[nape]] of the [[neck]]; a [[hairstyle]] for [[infant]]s in the [[w:Edo_period|Edo period]], [[shave|shaving]] the whole head except for a small area on the [[nape]] of the [[neck]]
* {{ja-r|目%窪|め%くぼ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|目%凹|め%くぼ}}: [[sunken]] [[eye]]s; a person with sunken or [[deep-set]] eyes
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{sense|indentation}} {{ja-r|窪み|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|窪|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹み|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹|くぼみ}}
* {{sense|female genitalia}} {{ja-r|前門|ぜんもん}}, {{ja-r|まんこ|まんこ}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くぼみ}}
Noun stem of verb {{m|ja|凹む|tr=kubomu||to become hollow, to become sunken, to become indented}}, itself a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=くぼみ|凹|tr1=kubo|t1=an indentation, a dip|む|tr2=mu|t2=to become like something|pos2=auxiliary verb attaching to nouns or adjective stems, cognate with {{ja-r|びる}} ''biru''}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|くぼみ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|窪み|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|窪|くぼみ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|凹み|くぼみ|rom=-}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|くぼみ}}

# a [[pit]], a [[hollow]], a [[cavity]], a [[depression]], a [[dent]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{ja-r|凹み|くぼみ|rom=-}} or {{ja-r|窪み|くぼみ|rom=-}} spelling with the {{l|ja|sc=Latn|送り仮名|okurigana}} {{lang|ja|み}} is more common when used as a standalone term. The spelling without the okurigana is more common in compounds.

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|なかくぼ}}
Compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なかくぼ|中|tr1=naka|t1=inside, inner|窪|tr2=kubo|t2=pit, indentation}}.<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|なかくぼ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=2|acc2_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|中%窪|なか%くぼ|rom=-}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{ja-r|中%窪|なか%くぼ|rom=-}} spelling is more common.

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|中%低|なか%びく}}

subSections.title: Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|へこみ}}
Noun stem of verb {{m|ja|凹む|tr=hekomu||to become hollow, to become sunken, to become indented}}, itself an [[abbreviate]]d compound of {{compound|ja|sort=へこみ|減る|alt1=減り|tr1=heri|pos1=noun stem of verb {{m|ja|減る|tr=heru||to reduce, to decrease, to diminish}}|込む|tr2=komu|t2=to go inwardly}}.<ref name="KDJ"/>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|へこみ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|凹み|へこみ}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|へこみ}}

# a [[pit]], a [[hollow]], a [[cavity]], a [[depression]], a [[dent]]
# a [[mistake]], and [[error]]
# a [[moment]] of [[weakness]] or [[confusion]], being [[at a loss]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{ja-r|凹み|へこみ}} spelling is more common.

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 6
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ぼこ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ぼこ}}

# an [[indentation]], a [[dip]] or [[divot]], a [[hollow]], a [[dent]] in a surface

subSections.title: Derived terms
References
subSections.text: <references/>
